inclusion.criterion: test in comparison to the most reliable standard tools such as cultures, blood tests and X-rays.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all post neurosurgical patients with suspect infection or fever
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Analysis of ligand-binding affinity with surface plasmon resonance
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 55yo woman with h/o ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis who presented with watery, non bloody diarrhea and weakness. She has a history of 2 prior C diff infections, the most recent just 1 month ago.
